Main:
MAIN MENU       

 What would you like to do?
 Type 0 to Close Application.
 Type 1 to Create a Stack.
 Type 2 to Create a Flashcard.
 Type 3 to Delete a Stack.
 Type 4 to Delete a Flashcard.
 Type 5 to Show the List of Stacks.
 Type 6 to Show Flashcards in a Stack.
 Type 7 to Update a Stack.
 Type 8 to Update a Flashcard in a Stack.
CreateStackInputName: Input a name for a new Stack
DeleteFlashcardInstruction: Chose ID of the Flashcard you want to delete.
DeleteStackInstruction: Input the name of Stack you want to delete.
UpdateChoseFlashcard: Chose ID of Flashcard you want to update.
UpdateChoseStack: Input the name of Stack you want to update.
